syndrome.translation[0].definitions[0].d: an illness which consists of a set of physical or mental problems – often used in the name of illnesses
syndrome.translation[0].definitions[0].e: people who suffer from irritable bowel syndrome
syndrome.translation[0].definitions[1].d: a set of qualities, events, or types of behaviour that is typical of a particular kind of problem
syndrome.translation[0].definitions[1].e: ‘The underdog syndrome’ is a belief that things are beyond your control.
